sense.def:
Z izrazom
particularly
pokažemo, da tisto, kar govorimo, velja še posebej za eno stvar ali položaj.

seg.quote: It was hard for children, particularly when they were ill.
He was challenged by the workers, particularly Gibson.

sense.def:
Particularly
pomeni tudi več kot ponavadi ali več kot normalno.

seg.quote: She was looking particularly attractive today.
This is not particularly difficult to do.
